1.content: Hi! I saw your posting for the Senior React Developer role. I'm really excited about the opportunity to work with your team.
Thanks for reaching out! I'd love to learn more about your React experience. Can you tell me about your most challenging React project?
I led the migration of a legacy jQuery application to React 18 with TypeScript. It was a 6-month project serving 50k+ daily users. The biggest challenge was maintaining uptime during the migration.

2.content: Hello! I'm interested in the Full-Stack Engineer position. I have 5 years of experience with Node.js and React.
Great to hear from you! What's your experience with scalable backend architectures?
